alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 11:53PM CDT until June 07 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1153 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Moscow to 5 miles southeast of Rolla to 4 miles southwest of Elkhart, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Guymon, Hooker, Tyrone, Optima, Hardesty, Bryans Corner, Hough, Baker, Adams, Boyd, Turpin and Floris. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
